attributes.action: End discrimination towards people with poor literacy from government bodies.
attributes.background: As someone who has experienced it first hand I would like to end discrimination against farmers with poor literacy in the common agricultural policy. This has already been raised at a parliamentary reception in Scotland several years ago.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about people with poor literacy being discriminated against but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would like to see taken.
